item.description:
Walk -> Potluck -> Party! GO PATS!!!

Bring a potluck food item and beverage to Joanna's house at 3:00. We will walk for about 2 hours. Route will depend on road and path conditions, and weather, but we will be walking around Wellesley. We should be back around 5:30ish and will put out the food and beverage spread. By kick-off at 6:30, we should be ready to relax in front of the TV.

I will email my address to all confirmed "yes" RSVPs. In your RSVP. let us know if there is something particular that you would like to bring for the potluck. Otherwise, I may ask you specifically to bring an entree, appetizer, salad or desert. BYOB.

Heavy rain or snow will cancel walk, but not party! If you want to party, but not walk, come at 5:30.
item.why: Who doesn't love a good football game?
item.name: Superbowl Sunday walk, potluck and party!
